Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the Korean drama "My Secret, Terrius" by suggesting that it predicted the coronavirus outbreak.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the Korean drama accurately predicted the COVID-19 pandemic.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the fictional series accurately predicted the future, which is considered preposterous.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation by stating that the "mutant coronavirus" spoken about in the series is not similar to the novel coronavirus.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the "mutant coronavirus" in the series is not the same as the novel coronavirus.
Understate: There is no evidence of underestimation bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
